title: Profit, you gotta be out of your cotton pickin' mind
creator_credit: Sam Weiss, Nick Bosustow and Stephen Bosustow Productions
brief_description: Making a profit, the essence of business survival, is humorously traced in retelling the story of Eli Whitney and his cotton gin. This animated story illustrates a simple explanation of the need for profit in business.
